name: Extreme Grandma Defense Attack
description:
Granny's garden is in danger! It's being invaded and attacked and she's not going to take it anymore!

Extreme Grandma Defense Attack is a FREE, simple and addicting game that's fun for all ages. Granny loves her garden and she will eliminate anything that tries to damage it!

Rabid dogs, crazy crows and evil zombies are all out to get little old grandma. There's only one thing to do: destroy them! The game will start moving faster and faster, so watch out!

Collect enough flowers and you can unlock additional firepower for granny to use for even more fun!

*** FEATURES ***

* Incredible endless gameplay means a new game every time
* Collect flowers to unlock more characters
* Simple game controls good for both kids and adults
* Amazing graphics
* Game Center enabled
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch

Download Extreme Grandma Defense Attack right now while it's 100% FREE!
